message.content:
cs.CV, cs.MM, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CR 

The paper proposes a method for video-based person re-identification using convolutional neural networks (CNNs) and attention mechanisms. This problem falls under computer vision, specifically in the area of person recognition and tracking. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also utilizes deep learning techniques, which could fall under cs.MM (Multimedia) or cs.LG (Machine Learning). Additionally, the paper proposes a novel method for embedding features, which could fall under cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Finally, the paper deals with surveillance and security, which could fall under cs.CR (Cryptography and Security).
